text: @AndrewScheer Yet according to the Globe and Mail the Covid-19 Parliamentary Committee has been slow, because fewer than half the Conservative members actually show up for their meetings. The phrase "physician heal thyself" comes to mind. But you don't care, as long as you get your comp life.
